TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Peter_Mutharika, title = Peter_Mutharika, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Mutharika} }

S.FORM: Peter Mutharika I 1940 a miheca saka folad saka a romi'ad masofoc ci Peter Mutharika, malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Malawi anini i ci Peter Mutharika, patirengan a romi'ad i 2014 a miheca saka 5 folad saka 31 a romi'ad.

Peter Motharika I 1940 a miheca saka folad saka a romi'ad masofoc ci Peter Motharika, malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Malawi anini i ci Peter Motharika, patirengan a romi'ad i 2014 a miheca saka 5 folad saka 31 a romi'ad.
